# Guinea Investment Platform

A secure web + mobile app for micro-investments, savings, crypto, and Forex trading in Guinea Conakry.

## ðŸš€ Features
- User registration & KYC/AML verification
- Wallet system with Orange Money & MTN Mobile Money integration
- Micro-investments (min $5), savings accounts, local projects (agriculture, real estate)
- Crypto & Forex trading via API integration
- Secure authentication, encryption, and fraud detection
- Multilingual support (French + local languages)
